DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 3 study compare efficacy , safety tolerability moxidectin ivermectin subject infect Onchocerca volvulus , parasite cause river blindness . Subjects participate study randomly assign ( 2 to1 ratio ) receive one orally-administered dose either moxidectin ivermectin .
DOC.brief_title: Study Comparing Moxidectin And Ivermectin In Subjects With Onchocerca Volvulus Infection
DOC.criteria: Male female subject Onchocerca volvulus infection Pregnant breast feed woman ; coincidental loiasis
